desc: I pushed a commit with "dead" 6 times.
I used a word "fuck" in my commit message.
body: Commits: - e6ac586: 恢复FUCK-GFW & 调整目录分布

desc: When I delete code, I delete a lot.
When I delete code, I delete a lot.

body: Commits: - cc75231: fix: 修复容器运行环境时区的问题 - 0e86036: fix(doge): reget client after refresh session (#6277) - 8a18f47: fix(doge): the temporary access key is only valid for two hours (#6273) * feat: add doge driver * doc: 补充readme文档 * fix: 对齐meta信息 * fix: 调整结构体名字,与driver保持一致 * perf: merge to s3 * Rename goge.go to doge.go * fix: 解决多吉云临时秘钥两个小时过期的问题 * fix: 定时任务在Drop中Stop --------- Co-authored-by: Andy Hsu
Commits: - 27dfa6d: fix: 调整yarn执行的命令 - 3747f97: fix: 将yarn.lock中的resolved地址改为淘宝源 - b720b5b: fix: 调整为http的地址 - eb31b38: fix: 恢复yarn.lock试试
Commits: - b718ece: fix: 当id为空时,通过uuid填充 - 80e6e8f: fix: 修复lint检查
Commits: - d00d6df: fix: 修复更新用户的逻辑bug (#282) - 5343539: fix: 用户更新时提交默认分组的问题 (#276) - 2032322: fix: 飞书处理离职用户是字段错误的问题 (#275) - 87ec6a1: fix: 管理员初始化时默认邮箱的问题 (#274) - 96d8ab2: fix: 字段长度验证与模型对齐 (#273)

Commits: - 9a428c0: fix: 用户操作过程中角色权限的一些校验问题 (#90) - 458cf59: fix: 修复飞书根部门用户获取问题 (#88) - 0bdefa9: fix: 从ldap同步过来之后groupType字段的问题 (#86) - 0c131ed: fix: 飞书手机号超过11位的问题 (#85) - 2c60a16: fix: 调整三方同步时分组与成员判断是否存在的依据,改为与ldap一致的DN (#84) - efb2fd9: fix: 部门名称有中英文混合的情况&解决部门添加移除用户时用户信息未更新的问题 (#83) - 1d0df89: fix: 多级部门同步的问题 (#79) * fix: dockerfile调整初始化方式 * fix: 多级部门同步的问题

desc: I committed on the day Doctor Emmett Brown invented the flux capacitor!
I rolled before Covid-19: Survivor of the Great TP Shortage
I have participated in pull requests with 5 or more people
body: Pull requests: - #165: [原创 2019-06-26] 使用Active-Choices-Plugin插件将十个Job合成一个

desc: I have participated in pull requests with 10 or more people
body: Pull requests: - #1: Jenkins角色权限控制Role-Based-Strategy(小黄锁)探微

desc: I merged a PR with failing checks
body: Pull requests: - #40: add some repo - #101: feat: 调整action打镜像,增加arm版本,增加同步到ali仓库,增加release的自动生成

desc: I found the answer to the ultimate question of life, the universe, and everything!

body:
My favorite commit message words are:

1. updated (used 828 times)
2. update (used 804 times)
3. powered (used 676 times)
4. https://github.com/gee1k/upic (used 676 times)
5. followers (used 603 times)

I use words like "thanks" and "please" in my issues: - #2371: 【项目】：整理记录各个包管理器好用的镜像 - #191: 【开源自荐】各种语言，软件，系统的国内镜像，收藏这一个仓库就够了： Thanks-Mirror - #4: fedora镜像没了 - #274: How can I refer to this project to complete my own website construction - #2196: 自荐项目：Thanks-Mirror And many more...

desc: I pushed a commit with "cafe" once.
I committed on the Halloween! Boo!
I liked my own comment so much that I upvoted it.
Happy February 29th! I committed on a Leap Day!
